mapper.select: select * from pathpost_t where r_areacode = #{r_areacode} order by heart desc limit 5
select * from pathpost_t where r_contenttypeid = #{r_contenttypeid} order by heart desc limit 5
select p.* from pathmarker_t m , pathpost_t p where m.path_post_idx = p.path_post_idx and m.contentid = #{contentid} order by p.heart desc limit 4
mapper.insert: insert into popup_t (subject, f_name, regdate) values (#{subject}, #{f_name}, sysdate())
mapper.select: select * from popup_t order by regdate desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
mapper.update: update popup_t set popup_state = 0 where popup_idx = (select popup_idx from popup_t where popup_state = 1)
